title: Web Developer
description:
**Company Description**
  

 Revynor is a design\\-focused interior and renovation brand that specializes in delivering comprehensive turnkey solutions for modern living. We excel in transforming residential spaces through innovative design, quality craftsmanship, and seamless project management. From initial planning to final handover, we oversee all aspects of the process, ensuring a smooth and stress\\-free experience that aligns with our clients' unique lifestyles. Our vision is to redefine spaces through complete turnkey interior solutions, and we are committed to delivering high\\-quality, creative, and thoughtful renovations.
   

  

**Role Description**
  

 We are seeking a skilled Web Developer to join our team for wfh unpaid internship in Pune for a full\\-time role. The Web Developer will be responsible for creating, maintaining, and optimizing functional and visually appealing websites. Daily tasks will include designing user interfaces, implementing responsive designs, writing and modifying code, troubleshooting issues, and ensuring website performance and usability. The candidate will collaborate with cross\\-functional teams to meet project requirements and deliver exceptional user experiences.
   

  

**Qualifications**
  

* Strong skills in Front\\-End Development and Web Design to create responsive and user\\-friendly interfaces
* Experience with Back\\-End Web Development and Programming to build and maintain robust server\\-side solutions
* Proficiency in Web Development, including knowledge of modern web technologies and frameworks
* Excellent problem\\-solving and debugging abilities
* Ability to collaborate with cross\\-functional teams and deliver projects on schedule
* Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Web Development, or a related field
* Familiarity with UX/UI design principles is a plus

title: Python
description:
**Company Description**

 PPStack is a global EdTech brand dedicated to transforming education by bridging the gap between learning and industry. Leveraging artificial intelligence, innovative teaching methods, and cutting\\-edge technology, PPStack delivers future\\-ready skills, empowering learners and organizations to thrive in the digital age. With diverse offerings including AI\\-powered learning platforms, career coaching, corporate training, and technology consulting, PPStack creates an ecosystem where education drives innovation and career growth. Trusted by learners worldwide, PPStack plays a key role in shaping careers and advancing digital empowerment.
   




**Role Description**

 This is a full\\-time remote role for a Python developer. The responsibilities include designing, developing, and deploying scalable Python code for web and desktop applications. The role involves implementing APIs, managing databases, ensuring strong data security practices, and collaborating with cross\\-functional teams to develop software solutions that align with business requirements. The candidate will engage in testing, debugging, and optimizing applications for performance and reliability.
   




**Qualifications**
* Proficiency in Python programming and related frameworks (e.g., Flask, Django)
* Experience with API development, integration, and backend services
* Knowledge of database management systems (e.g., PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB)
* Familiarity with DevOps practices, deployment pipelines, and cloud platforms
* Strong problem\\-solving skills and the ability to write clean, maintainable code
* Excellent collaboration and communication skills for working in a remote team environment
* Understanding of machine learning concepts or experience with data analysis libraries (preferred but not required)
* Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field

title: Java Full Stack Developer
description:
A Java Full Stack Developer with React JS, JavaScript, and Spring Boot is a software engineer skilled in both frontend and backend development, capable of building complete web applications from user interfaces to server\\-side logic.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Develop responsive and user\\-friendly frontend applications using React JS.
* Build robust backend services with Spring Boot, including RESTful APIs.
* Integrate frontend and backend seamlessly to create a full\\-stack web application.
* Implement security features such as user authentication, authorization, and secure data handling.
* Manage databases, perform CRUD operations, and ensure data integrity.
* Use version control systems like Git to collaborate and maintain code quality.
* Deploy and maintain applications in production environments.


**Requirements**
* Looking for Senior full stack developer with minimum of 6\\+years of experience
* Frontend: React JS (a JavaScript library for building dynamic user interfaces), JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and frameworks like Bootstrap for styling.
* Backend: Java with Spring Boot framework to create RESTful APIs, handle business logic, and manage data persistence.
* Security: Spring Security for authentication and authorization, often using JWT (JSON Web Tokens) for securing REST APIs.
* Database: Experience with relational databases like MySQL or NoSQL databases like MongoDB, using Spring Data JPA or similar for data access.
* Tools: IntelliJ IDEA, VS Code, Maven, NPM, Postman, Git for version control, and CI/CD pipelines for deployment.


**Nice to have**
* Knowledge of API design and implementation (REST) and at least theoretical understanding of AWS concepts


**We offer**
* Opportunity to work on bleeding\\-edge projects
* Work with a highly motivated and dedicated team
* Competitive salary
* Flexible schedule
* Benefits package \\- medical insurance, sports
* Corporate social events
* Professional development opportunities
* Well\\-equipped office


**About Us**
 Grid Dynamics (NASDAQ: GDYN) is a leading provider of technology consulting, platform and product engineering, AI, and advanced analytics services. Fusing technical vision with business acumen, we solve the most pressing technical challenges and enable positive business outcomes for enterprise companies undergoing business transformation. A key differentiator for Grid Dynamics is our 8 years of experience and leadership in enterprise AI, supported by profound expertise and ongoing investment in data, analytics, cloud \\& DevOps, application modernization and customer experience. Founded in 2006, Grid Dynamics is headquartered in Silicon Valley with offices across the Americas, Europe, and India.

title: Lead Software Engineer
description:
**Company Description**

 Shortchase is a prediction\\-sharing platform that enables users to share, explore, like, repost, and discuss predictions on topics such as sports, politics, and current events. The platform fosters a dynamic space for users to engage and exchange insights on various trending subjects. By encouraging active interaction and knowledge sharing, Shortchase aims to create a vibrant community centered around predictions.
   




**Role Description**

 This is a full\\-time remote role for a Lead Software Engineer. The individual will be responsible for leading software development projects, collaborating with cross\\-functional teams, and ensuring the delivery of efficient, scalable, and maintainable back\\-end systems. Tasks include designing, developing, and implementing software solutions, writing clean and efficient code, and mentoring team members. You will also identify and resolve technical challenges, participate in code reviews, and contribute to continuous improvement initiatives within the development process.
   




**Qualifications**
* Strong knowledge and expertise in Computer Science and Software Development.
* Proficiency in Back\\-End Web Development and Object\\-Oriented Programming (OOP).
* Practical experience with Programming languages and frameworks.
* Strong problem\\-solving abilities and a passion for creating cutting\\-edge solutions.
* Ability to lead and mentor engineering teams effectively.
* Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a related field.
* Experience with cloud platforms, APIs, and/or version control systems is a plus.

title: GenAI Developer
description:
Preferred Qualifications: \\* Certification in AI or a related field, such as Certified Data Scientist or Certified AI Engineer \\* Experience with other AI frameworks and technologies, such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, or Keras \\* Familiarity with containerization using Docker and Kubernetes \\* Experience with agile development methodologies and version control systems, such as Git \\* Strong understanding of software design patterns, principles, and best practices \\* Experience with DevOps practices, such as continuous integration and continuous deployment \\* Knowledge of cloud computing platforms, such as Azure / GCP / AWS
   

  

 Job Responsibilities: \\* Design, develop, and deploy AI models and systems using Python, Gen AI, Agentic AI, and other relevant technologies \\* Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams to identify business problems and develop AI\\-powered solutions \\* Work with large datasets to train and test AI models, and optimize their performance \\* Apply Prompt Engineering techniques to improve the overall performance of the AI systems \\* Troubleshoot and debug AI systems to ensure optimal performance and reliability \\* Provide technical guidance and expertise to ensure high\\-quality deliverables \\* Collaborate with the cross functional teams \\* Participate in code reviews and contribute to the improvement of the overall code quality
   

  

 Required Qualifications: \\* Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field (B.E/B.Tech/M.E/M.Tech/MCA) \\* At least 2\\-6 years of experience in software development, with at least 2 years of hands on experience in Gen AI development \\* Strong proficiency in Python programming language \\* Hands on experience with LangChain, Gen AI, Agentic AI, and Prompt Engineering

title: Lead Software Engineer - ReactJS, Java Script, Python
description:
**Job Description**
 We have an opportunity to impact your career and provide an adventure where you can push the limits of what's possible.
   

  

 As a Lead Software Engineer at JPMorgan Chase within the Commercial and Investment Bank's Equities Tech Team, you are an integral part of an agile team that works to enhance, build, and deliver trusted market\\-leading technology products in a secure, stable, and scalable way. As a core technical contributor, you are responsible for conducting critical technology solutions across multiple technical areas within various business functions in support of the firm‚Äôs business objectives.
   

  

**Job Responsibilities**
* Execute software solutions, design, development, and technical troubleshooting with ability to think beyond routine or conventional approaches to build solutions or break down technical problems.
* Create secure and high\\-quality production code and maintains algorithms that run synchronously with appropriate systems.
* Produce architecture and design artifacts for complex applications while being accountable for ensuring design constraints are met by software code development.
* Gather, analyze, synthesize, and develop visualizations and reporting from large, diverse data sets in service of continuous improvement of software applications and systems.
* Identify hidden problems and patterns in data and uses these insights to drive improvements to coding hygiene and system architecture.
* Contribute to software engineering communities of practice and events that explore new and emerging technologies.


**Required Qualifications, Capabilities, And Skills**
* Formal training or certification on software engineering concepts and 5\\+ years applied experience.
* Expertise in developing, debugging and have sound knowledge in UI technologies React, JavaScript, CSS, and HTML5\\.
* Expertise using modern front\\-end tools such as React, Redux, SASS, Webpack, Jest, etc.
* Hands\\-on practical experience delivering system design, application development, testing, and operational stability.
* Knowledge of one or more programming language(s) \\- Python, Microservices and Micro front end Architecture.
* Proficient in all aspects of the Software Development Life Cycle.
* Solid understanding of agile methodologies such as CI/CD, Application Resiliency, and Security.
* Ability and willingness to take complete ownership over a feature, bug or entire project and drive it to completion.


**Preferred Qualifications, Capabilities, And Skills**
* Familiarity with modern front\\-end technologies
* In\\-depth knowledge of the financial services industry and their IT systems
* Experience with public/private Cloud technologies
* Experience designing Distributed Systems
* Ability to lead collaborative teams to achieve organizational goals, and passionate about building an innovative culture


**ABOUT US**

title: Technical Lead
description:
We‚Äôre building a modern, AI\\-powered Learning Management System that supports educational institutions at scale. Our platform serves students, instructors, and administrators through multiple integrated applications, delivering intelligent, personalized learning experiences.
 



  





 We‚Äôre looking for a
 **Senior Technical Lead** 
 to own the technical vision and execution of our platform. This is a
 **hands\\-on leadership role** 
 : you‚Äôll design architecture, write production code daily, solve real\\-world scaling challenges, and mentor a growing engineering team.
 



 You‚Äôll play a critical role in shaping how our system evolves as we expand across institutions and introduce advanced AI\\-driven capabilities.
 



  





**What You‚Äôll Do:** 



* **Own Architecture \\& Technical Direction:** 
 Lead system design and technical decision\\-making across a multi\\-application monorepo supporting frontend apps and backend services.
* **Build \\& Ship Production Code:** 
 Stay hands\\-on‚Äîreview pull requests, debug production issues, and deliver features continuously.
* **Develop AI\\-Powered Capabilities:** 
 Expand our AI\\-driven teaching assistants, automated grading workflows, and intelligent content generation systems.
* **Design for Scale \\& Reliability:** 
 Architect systems that are resilient, performant, and ready to support a growing user base.
* **Mentor \\& Elevate the Team:** 
 Set engineering standards, run thoughtful code reviews, and help engineers grow technically and professionally.
* **Champion Quality \\& Operations:** 
 Drive best practices around testing, CI/CD, observability, and operational excellence.



  





**Technical Environment:** 



* **Architecture:** 
 Monorepo with multiple frontend applications and microservices
* **Stack:** 
 TypeScript end\\-to\\-end, modern React ecosystem, high\\-performance runtimes
* **Data:** 
 PostgreSQL, Redis, queue\\-based asynchronous processing
* **AI / ML:** 
 LLM integrations, RAG pipelines, embedding\\-based systems
* **Infrastructure:** 
 Cloud\\-native on Azure, containerized deployments, edge computing
* **Quality:** 
 Robust CI/CD pipelines, automated testing, semantic versioning



  





**What We‚Äôre Looking For:** 



* 8\\+ years of professional software engineering experience
* 3\\+ years in senior technical or engineering leadership roles
* Deep expertise in TypeScript and modern JavaScript ecosystems
* Strong experience building and scaling React\\-based frontends
* Proven ability to design APIs and backend services
* Experience working with monorepos and modern build tooling
* Track record of shipping and scaling production systems
* Excellent communication skills with both technical and non\\-technical stakeholders



  





**Highly Valued:** 



* Experience building AI/ML\\-powered features (LLMs, RAG, embeddings)
* Background in EdTech, LMS platforms, or e\\-learning systems
* Experience with real\\-time systems and asynchronous job processing
* Familiarity with exam proctoring or assessment platforms
* Open\\-source contributions



  





**You‚Äôll Thrive Here If You:** 



* Love leading without giving up hands\\-on coding
* Care deeply about code quality, but know when pragmatism matters
* Enjoy complex problem domains‚Äîeducation software is rich and nuanced
* Want to build AI/ML features used in real production systems
* Value developer experience as much as end\\-user experience
* Can comfortably switch between architecture, coding, debugging, and mentoring

title: Performance Engineering
description:
**Job Description**
 Value added Service \\[Acceptance Solutions]is a Product Development (PD) Group within the Technology Team. This group is responsible for building leading edge full\\-service Payment Solutions for our customers by combining global payment processing, fraud management, payment security and reporting systems. We are a group of bright, motivated engineers and technical managers excited about building the next generation of Payment products that will drive e\\-Commerce, mobile\\-Commerce as well as POS businesses for our customers.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Accountable for creating application and infrastructure performance plans/models for a highly scalable, low\\-latency, highly\\-available and high\\-throughput payment processing system.
* Work with the architects and development team to ensure proper metrics instrumentation done in software components, to help facilitate real time and remote troubleshooting/performance monitoring.
* Hands on experience in Unix/Linux OS environments and operating system internals, file systems, disk/storage and networking protocols System internals. Having working knowledge with VMs and Containers.
* Expert knowledge and strong experience using tools, Loadrunner/Jmeter,. etc. and understanding of APM solutions like Appdynamics, dynatrace, OPNET,. etc
* Coding Knowledge in programming languages like Java/Python and scripting languages is must
* Evaluate, develop and execute load test tools to stress the limits of most critical payment applications.
* Understand and performance test the APIs, abstractions and integration patterns to solve challenging distributed computing problems.
* Should have experience in defining Performance Strategy and reporting performance baselines required to certify Go\\-Lives. Should have strong experience in handling multiple tasks and stakeholders
* Should be well versed in documenting the steps performed during course of performance tests cycle including performance test scripts used
* Should be able to able to look at the code and suggest optimization techniques.
* Should have ability to work independently and be a team player.
* Actively contribute to capacity planning and disaster recovery exercises.
* Support in triaging and troubleshooting of issues related to performance degradation incidents in production environment
* Monitor application performance, optimize performance bottlenecks and usage to create an application capacity model.
* Help optimizing system components such as CPU/Memory/Disk/Network \\& OS/Application software for maximizing the computer resources utilization.


**Requirements**
**Qualifications**
* Bachelors and/or Masters degree in computer science or a related discipline, or equivalent work experience required
* 3 to 5 years of hands\\-on experience in Performance Engineering, Tuning, analysis or applications program development.


**We offer**
* Opportunity to work on bleeding\\-edge projects
* Work with a highly motivated and dedicated team
* Competitive salary
* Flexible schedule
* Benefits package \\- medical insurance, sports
* Corporate social events
* Professional development opportunities
* Well\\-equipped office


**About Us**
 Grid Dynamics (NASDAQ: GDYN) is a leading provider of technology consulting, platform and product engineering, AI, and advanced analytics services. Fusing technical vision with business acumen, we solve the most pressing technical challenges and enable positive business outcomes for enterprise companies undergoing business transformation. Founded in 2006, Grid Dynamics is headquartered in Silicon Valley with offices across the Americas, Europe, and India.

* Bachelors and/or Masters degree in computer science or a related discipline, or equivalent work experience required
* 3 to 5 years of hands\\-on experience in Performance Engineering, Tuning, analysis or applications program development.


**We offer**
* Opportunity to work on bleeding\\-edge projects
* Work with a highly motivated and dedicated team
* Competitive salary
* Flexible schedule
* Benefits package \\- medical insurance, sports
* Corporate social events
* Professional development opportunities
* Well\\-equipped office


**About Us**
 Grid Dynamics (NASDAQ: GDYN) is a leading provider of technology consulting, platform and product engineering, AI, and advanced analytics services. Fusing technical vision with business acumen, we solve the most pressing technical challenges and enable positive business outcomes for enterprise companies undergoing business transformation. A key differentiator for Grid Dynamics is our 8 years of experience and leadership in enterprise AI, supported by profound expertise and ongoing investment in data, analytics, cloud \\& DevOps, application modernization and customer experience. Founded in 2006, Grid Dynamics is headquartered in Silicon Valley with offices across the Americas, Europe, and India.

title: Performance Engineering
description:
**Job Description**
 Value added Service \\[Acceptance Solutions]is a Product Development (PD) Group within the Technology Team. This group is responsible for building leading edge full\\-service Payment Solutions for our customers by combining global payment processing, fraud management, payment security and reporting systems. We are a group of bright, motivated engineers and technical managers excited about building the next generation of Payment products that will drive e\\-Commerce, mobile\\-Commerce as well as POS businesses for our customers.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Accountable for creating application and infrastructure performance plans/models for a highly scalable, low\\-latency, highly\\-available and high\\-throughput payment processing system.
* Work with the architects and development team to ensure proper metrics instrumentation done in software components, to help facilitate real time and remote troubleshooting/performance monitoring.
* Hands on experience in Unix/Linux OS environments and operating system internals, file systems, disk/storage and networking protocols System internals. Having working knowledge with VMs and Containers.
* Expert knowledge and strong experience using tools, Loadrunner/Jmeter,. etc. and understanding of APM solutions like Appdynamics, dynatrace, OPNET,. etc
* Coding Knowledge in programming languages like Java/Python and scripting languages is must
* Evaluate, develop and execute load test tools to stress the limits of most critical payment applications.
* Understand and performance test the APIs, abstractions and integration patterns to solve challenging distributed computing problems.
* Should have experience in defining Performance Strategy and reporting performance baselines required to certify Go\\-Lives. Should have strong experience in handling multiple tasks and stakeholders
* Should be well versed in documenting the steps performed during course of performance tests cycle including performance test scripts used
* Should be able to able to look at the code and suggest optimization techniques.
* Should have ability to work independently and be a team player.
* Actively contribute to capacity planning and disaster recovery exercises.
* Support in triaging and troubleshooting of issues related to performance degradation incidents in production environment
* Monitor application performance, optimize performance bottlenecks and usage to create an application capacity model.
* Help optimizing system components such as CPU/Memory/Disk/Network \\& OS/Application software for maximizing the computer resources utilization.


**Requirements**
**Qualifications**
* Bachelors and/or Masters degree in computer science or a related discipline, or equivalent work experience required
* 3 to 5 years of hands\\-on experience in Performance Engineering, Tuning, analysis or applications program development.


**We offer**
* Opportunity to work on bleeding\\-edge projects
* Work with a highly motivated and dedicated team
* Competitive salary
* Flexible schedule
* Benefits package \\- medical insurance, sports
* Corporate social events
* Professional development opportunities
* Well\\-equipped office


**About Us**
 Grid Dynamics (NASDAQ: GDYN) is a leading provider of technology consulting, platform and product engineering, AI, and advanced analytics services. Fusing technical vision with business acumen, we solve the most pressing technical challenges and enable positive business outcomes for enterprise companies undergoing business transformation. A key differentiator for Grid Dynamics is our 8 years of experience and leadership in enterprise AI, supported by profound expertise and ongoing investment in data, analytics, cloud \\& DevOps, application modernization and customer experience. Founded in 2006, Grid Dynamics is headquartered in Silicon Valley with offices across the Americas, Europe, and India.

title: Performance Testing,Jmeter+Loadrunner,Neoload-- For Multiple Locations
description:
Performance Testing (3\\-15 yrs experience) \\-\\-Experience in Performance Testing/Jmeter \\& Load Runner/Neoload
   

  

 As part of the Infosys delivery team, your primary role would be to ensure effective Design, Development, Validation and Support activities, to assure that our clients are satisfied with the high levels of service in the technology domain.
   

  

* You will gather the requirements and specifications to understand the client requirements in a detailed manner and translate the same into system requirements.
* You will play a key role in the overall estimation of work requirements to provide the right information on project estimations to Technology Leads and Project Managers.
* You would be a key contributor to building efficient programs/ systems . If you think you fit right in to help our clients navigate their next in their digital transformation journey, this is the place for you! Mandatory skill \\- Performance Testing / Jmeter \\& Loadrunner / Neoload Job opening for locations \\- Bangalore, Hyderabad, Chennai, Pune,Bhubaneswar,Trivandrum,Coimbatore

title: Erpnext developer and python minimum experience 5 year
description:
**Company Description**
  

 AnalytixData transforms fragmented data into actionable strategies, enabling businesses to thrive in a dynamic world. Established during the COVID\\-19 era, the company specializes in providing AI\\-powered business solutions that enhance decision\\-making, mitigate risks, improve efficiency, and drive revenue. With expertise spanning diverse industries such as banking, retail, manufacturing, healthcare, and technology, AnalytixData empowers businesses to scale confidently with real\\-time insights and secure data governance. Headquartered in Noida, the company is committed to delivering precise, intelligent, and results\\-driven analytics solutions for forward\\-thinking organizations.
   

  

**Role Description**
  

 This is a full\\-time on\\-site role for an experienced ERPNext Developer, based in Jaipur. The professional will design, develop, customize, and test ERPNext solutions to meet client requirements. The role also includes providing support for functional and technical issues, working with cross\\-functional teams to integrate ERPNext with other applications, and continuously improving system performance. The ideal candidate will collaborate with stakeholders to ensure timely delivery of high\\-quality software solutions.
   

  

**Qualifications**
  

* Strong foundation in Computer Science concepts and principles.
* Expertise in Back\\-End Web Development and Software Development processes.
* Proficiency in Programming languages, with a focus on Python.
* In\\-depth knowledge of Object\\-Oriented Programming (OOP) concepts and practices.
* Familiarity with ERPNext development, customization, and integrations.
* At least 5 years of relevant experience in related roles is required.
* Strong problem\\-solving skills and an analytical mindset.
* Excellent communication skills and the ability to work collaboratively in a team environment.
* A Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field is preferred.

title: Adobe Workfront Administrator
description:
****About The Role:****
**Grade Level (for internal use):**
 09
   

  

****About The Role:****
 We are seeking an experienced Adobe Workfront Administrator to own and evolve our global work management platform at S\\&P Global. This position supports our in\\-house Creative Agency (The 199\\) and involves driving governance, integrations, data quality, and user adoption across Marketing, Creative, and cross\\-functional teams.
   

  

****Responsibilities And Impact:****
* Platform Ownership \\& Governance:
+ Architect and maintain Workfront portfolios, programs, projects, request queues, routing rules, custom forms/fields, templates, and blueprints.
+ Define governance (naming, taxonomy, statuses, approval flows), enforce standards, and manage license strategy.

* User \\& Access Management:
+ Manage groups, teams, roles, and permissions; administer SSO/SCIM; ensure audit, security, and compliance.

* Reporting, Dashboards \\& Data Quality:
+ Build advanced reports, dashboards, and calculated fields for capacity, throughput, time tracking, SLAs, and OKRs.
+ Monitor data hygiene, conduct periodic audits, and drive corrective actions.

* Integrations \\& Automation:
+ Lead integrations via Workfront Fusion and APIs (e.g., AEM, Marketo Engage/Adobe, Jira, Salesforce, Slack/Teams, SharePoint).
+ Design automation to reduce manual work and improve cycle times.

* Release \\& Change Management:
+ Own sandbox strategy, UAT, release notes, and change logs; run pilots and phased rollouts.
+ Create enablement assets (how\\-tos, SOPs, videos) and deliver office hours and training.

* Support \\& Continuous Improvement:
+ Run the Workfront help desk/backlog, triage tickets, and meet SLAs.
+ Track adoption/ROI metrics; surface insights and roadmap recommendations to leadership.

* Risk, Reliability \\& Vendor Liaison:
+ Proactively manage incidents, escalations, and platform reliability; partner with Adobe Support as needed.


**Compensation/Benefits Information:** 
 (This section is only applicable to US candidates)
   

  

 S\\&P Global states that the anticipated base salary range for this position is $53,094 to $95,087\\.75\\. Final base salary for this role will be based on the individual‚Äôs geographic location, as well as experience level, skill set, training, licenses and certifications.
   

  

 In addition to base compensation, this role is eligible for an annual incentive plan.
   

  

 This role is eligible to receive additional S\\&P Global benefits. For more information on the benefits we provide to our employees, please click here.
   

  

****What We‚Äôre Looking For:****
**Basic Required Qualifications:**
* 5\\+ years of hands\\-on Adobe Workfront administration at Adobe or within a large enterprise using Workfront.
* Proven experience configuring complex request\\-to\\-delivery workflows, custom forms, templates, reports, and permissions at scale.
* Practical expertise with Workfront Fusion (or comparable iPaaS) and familiarity with REST APIs.
* Background supporting marketing/creative operations or PMO in a B2B environment.
* Strong stakeholder management, documentation, training, and problem\\-solving skills.
* Bachelor‚Äôs degree or equivalent professional experience.


****Additional Preferred Qualifications:****
* Administration experience with Adobe Experience Cloud (e.g., AEM Sites/Assets, Adobe Real\\-Time CDP, Marketo Engage).
* Admin experience with work management tools like Monday.com, Jira, Smartsheet, or ServiceNow.


**What‚Äôs In It For** 
**You?**
****Our Mission:****
 Advancing Essential Intelligence.
   

  

****Our People:****
 We're more than 35,000 strong worldwide‚Äîso we're able to understand nuances while having a broad perspective. Our team is driven by curiosity and a shared belief that Essential Intelligence can help build a more prosperous future for us all.From finding new ways to measure sustainability to analyzing energy transition across the supply chain to building workflow solutions that make it easy to tap into insight and apply it. We are changing the way people see things and empowering them to make an impact on the world we live in. We‚Äôre committed to a more equitable future and to helping our customers find new, sustainable ways of doing business. Join us and help create the critical insights that truly make a difference.
   

  

****Our Values:****
**Integrity, Discovery, Partnership**
 Throughout our history, the world's leading organizations have relied on us for the Essential Intelligence they need to make confident decisions about the road ahead. We start with a foundation of integrity in all we do, bring a spirit of discovery to our work, and collaborate in close partnership with each other and our customers to achieve shared goals.
   

  

****Benefits:****
 We take care of you, so you can take care of business. We care about our people. That‚Äôs why we provide everything you‚Äîand your career‚Äîneed to thrive at S\\&P Global.
   

  

**Our Benefits Include:**
* Health \\& Wellness: Health care coverage designed for the mind and body.
* Flexible Downtime: Generous time off helps keep you energized for your time on.
* Continuous Learning: Access a wealth of resources to grow your career and learn valuable new skills.
* Invest in Your Future: Secure your financial future through competitive pay, retirement planning, a continuing education program with a company\\-matched student loan contribution, and financial wellness programs.
* Family Friendly Perks: It‚Äôs not just about you. S\\&P Global has perks for your partners and little ones, too, with some best\\-in class benefits for families.
* Beyond the Basics: From retail discounts to referral incentive awards‚Äîsmall perks can make a big difference.


 For more information on benefits by country visit: https://spgbenefits.com/benefit\\-summaries
   

  

****Global Hiring And Opportunity At S\\&P Global:****
 At S\\&P Global, we are committed to fostering a connected and engaged workplace where all individuals have access to opportunities based on their skills, experience, and contributions. Our hiring practices emphasize fairness, transparency, and merit, ensuring that we attract and retain top talent. By valuing different perspectives and promoting a culture of respect and collaboration, we drive innovation and power global markets.
   

  

****Recruitment Fraud Alert:****
 If you receive an email from a spglobalind.com domain or any other regionally based domains, it is a scam and should be reported to reportfraud@spglobal.com. S\\&P Global never requires any candidate to pay money for job applications, interviews, offer letters, ‚Äúpre\\-employment training‚Äù or for equipment/delivery of equipment. Stay informed and protect yourself from recruitment fraud by reviewing our guidelines, fraudulent domains, and how to report suspicious activity here.
   

  

**Equal Opportunity Employer**
 S\\&P Global is an equal opportunity employer and all qualified candidates will receive consideration for employment without regard to race/ethnicity, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age, disability, marital status, military veteran status, unemployment status, or any other status protected by law. Only electronic job submissions will be considered for employment.
   

  

 If you need an accommodation during the application process due to a disability, please send an email to:‚ÄØEEO.Compliance@spglobal.com‚ÄØand your request will be forwarded to the appropriate person.
   

  

**US Candidates Only:** 
 The EEO is the Law Poster http://www.dol.gov/ofccp/regs/compliance/posters/pdf/eeopost.pdf‚ÄØdescribes discrimination protections under federal law. Pay Transparency Nondiscrimination Provision \\- https://www.dol.gov/sites/dolgov/files/ofccp/pdf/pay\\-transp\\_%20English\\_formattedESQA508c.pdf
